mdRecord.dcterms:title: A new and exact map of France: divided into all its provinces and acquisitions, according to the newest observations, and that accurate survey made by the King's command by Mr. Picar and de la Hire, with the post roads and the computed leagues from town to town, the passes of the Pirenean Mountains, and many other remarcks &c / by H. Moll Geographer
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Moll, Herman, -1732 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 61 x 98 cm. on sheet 64 x 107 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map image flanked on both sides by tables of principal cities, towns, and distances. [original]
Table: A list of the ports or passes of the Pyrennean Mountains, markt 1.2.3. &c. [original]
Explanation: post roads..., smaller spots...parliament towns, Archbishopricks, Bishopricks, universities, places where battles have been fought by the English... [original]
Earlier version, with variant imprint, issued ca. 1714. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: "France" written in brown ink on verso. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: France--Maps--Early works to 1800
